actions.name: Shadow Reapers (Magical)
actions.description: The Dreadlord summons D4 Shadow Reapers to fight on its behalf. These shadowy minions attack immediately after the Dreadlord's turn, each making a scythe attack (Combat Skill 40, D4 Cold damage) against a creature, disappearing immediately after.

actions.name: Aura of Despair (Magical)
actions.description: The Dreadlord radiates an aura of despair for D4 rounds. Creatures that start their turn near the Dreadlord must make a Resolve check or be Frightened (10).

actions.name: Ethereal Scythe (Physical)
actions.description: The Dreadlord swings its spectral scythe at a target, dealing D8 Slashing damage on a hit. If the target is a PC, they must succeed on an Endurance check or have its maximum Toughness reduced by the amount of damage taken. This reduction lasts until the character finishes a rest.

actions.name: Shroud of Darkness
actions.description: The Dreadlord wraps itself in a shroud of darkness, becoming heavily obscured and becoming Resistant to all damage except Holy damage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Weakening Gaze (Magical)
actions.description: The Dreadlord fixates its gaze upon a creature, consuming the targetâ€™s physical condition. The target must pass an Endurance check or become infected with the Rot (see page 87).

actions.name: Abyssal Projectiles (Magical)
actions.description: The Dreadlord hurls abyssal projectiles at up to three targets. Each target must make a Spellward check, taking D6+2 Necrotic damage on a failed check.

system.description: The Dreadlord is a nightmarish enforcer of darkness and despair. Its very presence casts a shroud of dread, permeating the air with an aura that drains hope and vitality, and with each gesture it commands an ethereal army of shadow reapers, each one a harbinger of impending doom. Its mastery over the abyss allows it to conjure projectiles that seek out the very souls of its foes, and those who survive must face its terrible scythe.
